author: BVM Sportsdesk
title: Sean McVay's Hilarious Tapes: How He Recruited Davante Adams
text:
Sean McVay’s Hilarious Tapes: How He Recruited Davante Adams
Sean McVay utilized a creative approach to recruit Davante Adams to the Rams, sending him amusing, narrated highlight tapes of his own plays. The head coach's unique style included commentary on plays, showcasing how many similar successful moments could be shared if Adams joined the team. McVay's efforts, combined with the appealing Los Angeles climate and the presence of Matthew Stafford, contributed significantly to Adams signing a two-year, $46 million deal.
- Davante Adams signed a two-year deal worth $46 million with the Rams.
- During his last four seasons with the Packers, Adams averaged 108 receptions for 1,328 yards and 12 touchdowns per year.
- Adams is now with the Rams, adding significant firepower to their offense.
- McVay’s energetic recruiting method is seen as a key factor in Adams' choice.
With Adams now in the mix, the Rams will look to leverage his capabilities alongside Matthew Stafford to enhance their offensive strategy and aim for a successful season.
Bottom LineMcVay's creative and enthusiastic recruitment approach helped secure Adams, showcasing the power of personalized engagement in attracting top talent to strengthen the team's performance.
Read more at @foxsports

author: Dalila Escobar
title: â€œHabrÃ¡ consejeros que respondan a intereses del PRIANâ€�: Sheinbaum
text: Reforma del Poder Judicial â€œHabrÃ¡ consejeros que respondan a intereses del PRIANâ€�: Sheinbaum La presidenta criticÃ³ a los inconformes con la decisiÃ³n del Consejo de la Judicatura Federal de aplicar descuentos a quien no regrese a trabajar.CIUDAD DE MÃ‰XICO (apro).- A los trabajadores â€œrebeldesâ€� con la decisiÃ³n del Consejo de la Judicatura Federal de aplicar descuentos a quien no regrese a trabajar, la presidenta Claudia Sheinbaum les cuestionÃ³: "Â¿CuÃ¡l es la razÃ³n de tanto enojo?", ademÃ¡s de apuntar a que inconformes con el avance de la elecciÃ³n, dentro del INE: â€œHabrÃ¡ consejeros que respondan a intereses del PRIANâ€�. â€œSon este grupo de trabajadores y tambiÃ©n quienes estÃ¡n detrÃ¡s de ello. Es quienes se manifestaron en contra de una reforma al Poder Judicial, que son grupos muy conservadores. A todos los trabajadores del Poder Judicial, lo hemos dicho muchas veces: No van a ser afectados sus derechos laborales, eso lo dice un transitorio de la reformaâ€�, afirmÃ³. â€œÂ¿Por quÃ© ellos se manifiestan? Es una pregunta, los jueces, las juezas pueden participar en el proceso de elecciÃ³n, pero es una decisiÃ³n que tomÃ³ el pueblo de MÃ©xico (...) Â¿CuÃ¡l es la razÃ³n de su manifestaciÃ³n? Si van a ser respetados todos sus derechos laborales (...) Â¿CuÃ¡l es la razÃ³n de tanto enojo? Si ellos no van a tener ninguna afectaciÃ³nâ€�, seÃ±alÃ³. Incluso dijo que serÃ¡ al contrario, dado que ya no habrÃ¡ nombrados por ser hijos, primos, hermanos, por lo que serÃ¡ â€œmucho mÃ¡s transparenteâ€� porque se busca que se termine el nepotismo y la corrupciÃ³n. ReiterÃ³: â€œÂ¿Por quÃ© tanto odio? Â¿Por quÃ© tanto enojo? Â¿QuiÃ©nes son los que estÃ¡n en este movimiento? (...) No es un asunto de la presidenta con una jueza, no. Yo tengo un mandato popularâ€�. Por tanto, llamÃ³ a que regresen a trabajar dado que sus derechos laborales no serÃ¡n afectados, incluso â€œque se sienten de una manera razonable con el Consejo de la Judicatura para que se explique eso, pero tambiÃ©n lo que no puede ser es que estÃ©n en paro y sigan percibiendo su salario (...) No hay razÃ³n ni para el enojo ni para el odio porque van a ser respetados todos sus derechosâ€�. La mandataria federal tambiÃ©n dijo que de acuerdo con la informaciÃ³n que tiene el Ejecutivo Federal es â€œque continua la elecciÃ³n y no hay nada que la pueda detener porque ya hay una resoluciÃ³n del Tribunal Electoral y el INE ya emitiÃ³ un comunicadoâ€�. Sobre consejeros electorales que estÃ©n inconformes con la resoluciÃ³n del Tribunal, afirmÃ³: â€œHabrÃ¡ consejeros que respondan a intereses del PRIAN o a otros intereses, pero hay reforma constitucional, hay reconocimiento del tribunal de que tiene que continuar la elecciÃ³n y comunicado del INE de que dice la elecciÃ³n a jueces, magistrados y ministros va. La elecciÃ³n va es voluntad del pueblo de MÃ©xicoâ€�.

author: Marisol Fuentes Pérez
title: Un ciberatac provoca problemes en diverses webs d'entitats públiques i privades
text:
[Sociedad](/actualidad/sociedad)
Un ciberatac provoca problemes en diverses webs d'entitats públiques i privades
El servidor del principal proveïdor de pàgines web del país ha patit un atac hacker la passada nit d'orien per ara desconegut
Andorra la Vella
El servidor del principal proveïdor de pàgines web del país ha patit un ciberatac la passada nit el què ha provocat la caiguda dels webs del comú d'Andorra la Vella, Mobilitat, l'AR+I, Andorra Business, Pyrenées o RTVA, entre d'altres.
En el cas de l'agència de Mobilitat, els usuaris que necessitin informació s'han de posar en contacte a través del telèfon o les xarxes socials ja que l'app també s'ha vist afectada pel ciberatac.
Pel que fa al comú d'Andorra la Vella, els ciutadans s'han de dirigir també per telèfon, presencialment o a través de les xarxes socials a la corporació.
L'empresa afectada on estan allotjats els servidors d'aquestes webs està treballant intensament per recuperar el servei i restaurar les pàgines afectades. Per ara es desconeix l'origen de l'atac hacker, informació que haurà de facilitar l'entitat a l'agència de ciberseguretat en els propers dies, segons ha explicat el seu director, Jordi Ubach.
Per ara es desconeix l'afectació total de l'atac però ja se situa entre els més importants patit al país els darrers temps. També se'n desconeix l'origen. En aquest moment l'empresa afectada està concentrada en restaurar els servidors per reactivar les webs que, per ara, continuen sense funcionar. I en les properes hores interposarà una denúncia a la Policia
Segons Ubach, enguany s'ha detectat un repunt dels ciberatacs en relació a l'any anterior, en sintonia amb el què passa als països veïns.
Ubach ha afegit que pel moment els hackers no han atacat cap més empresa andorrana.

author: Madison Williams
title: Clayton Kershaw Gives Promising Update After Surgery Regarding Return to Dodgers
text: Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw had a knee and foot surgery on Wednesday, he posted on Instagram, and now he's gearing up for the recovery process. The now-two-time World Series champion seems positive regarding his 2025 availability just one day after the surgeries. He's ready to help out his Dodgers make an attempt at winning back-to-back World Series titles. Kershaw will turn 37 years old in March, leading many MLB fans to wonder if he would retire in the offseason and go out on top with another title. But, it sounds like the three-time Cy Young Award winning fully plans on returning to the Dodgers next season. "Planning to crush some rehab and be good as can be come next year," Kershaw wrote in his announcement. Kershaw's current contract has an option for 2025 worth $10 million. It would be his 18th season with Los Angeles. The 10-time All-Star only competed in seven games during the 2024 season. He missed the beginning of the season as he was recovering from an offseason shoulder surgery. Then, he was shut down for the remainder of the season after he injured his toe on Aug. 31. Kershaw didn't pitch in any of his team's postseason games on their journey to the World Series title.

author: Reuters
title: Moroccan man guilty of murdering man in UK in revenge for Gaza By Reuters
text: LONDON (Reuters) - A Moroccan man who stabbed to death a passer-by in the street in northeast England in what he later told police was revenge for Israeli action in Gaza was found guilty of murder on Thursday. Ahmed Alid, 45, who had sought asylum in Britain, killed his 70-year-old victim after approaching him from behind on a road in Hartlepool the early hours of Oct. 15 last year, having previously attacked his housemate with two knives, prosecutors said. After his arrest, he told detectives he had committed the acts because of the conflict in Gaza, and in revenge for Israel killing innocent children, blaming Britain for creating Israel, Britain's Crown Prosecution Service (CPS) said. Alid said if he had had a machine gun, and more weapons, he would have killed more people. "By his own admission, Ahmed Alid would have killed more people on that day if he had been able to," Nick Price, Head of the CPS Special Crime and Counter Terrorism Division, said in a statement. "Whatever his views were on the conflict in Gaza, this was a man who chose to attack two innocent people with a knife, and the consequences were devastating." Alid had first used two knives to attack his sleeping housemate, to whom he had become aggressive after learning of his conversion to Christianity, stabbing him six times while shouting "Allahu Akbar", or "god is greatest", the CPS said. The 32-year-old housemate, one of five asylum seekers who shared the property, managed to fight him off and another occupant came to his aid. Alid left the house with one of the knives and walked towards the centre of Hartlepool. [here](#)or [remove ads](/ad-free-subscription?source=desktop&medium=article_ad). He passed Terence Carney on the opposite side of the road before circling back and attacking him from behind, stabbing him six times in the chest, abdomen and back. Carney died shortly after police arrived. Following his interview with police, he attacked the two female detectives, with one suffering injuries to her shoulder and wrist. He was found guilty at Teeside Crown Court of murder, attempted murder and two counts of assaulting an emergency worker. He will be sentenced on May 17, when the judge will decide if his actions were related to terrorism.

author: Surbhi Pathak
title: Rain Likely To Spoil New Year's Celebrations As IMD Predicts Rainfall In These States; Check Weather Prediction For December 31 And January 1 | India News | Zee News
text: Rain Likely To Spoil New Year's Celebrations As IMD Predicts Rainfall In These States; Check Weather Prediction For December 31 And January 1 The IMD has predicted heavy rainfall in Tamil Nadu on New Year's eve, scroll down to check forecast for all states. Trending Photos New Delhi: The New Year is almost here, and you've probably prepared to say bye to 2023 and hello to 2024. But, there's a hitch – rain might mess up your plans. The India Meteorological Department (IMD) says there'll be heavy rain in many states in the next 3-4 days. According to IMD's weather bulletin, light rainfall is likely over Uttar Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh and Chhattisgarh from December 31 to Jan 2, 2024. Himachal Pradesh, Uttarakhand and East Rajasthan are also likely to witness rainfall during the next 2-3 days. The IMD has predicted, light to moderate rainfall over south Tamil Nadu and Kerala from Dec 31 to Jan 3, 2024. Heavy rainfall is also likely over southern part of Tamil Nadu on Dec 31 and January 1, 2024. Meanwhile, the dense fog continued to persist over Northwestern India lowering the visibility in several parts of the region. Dense to very dense fog blankets covered the many most parts of Punjab, Haryana, Chandigarh and Delhi and some parts of Uttar Pradesh and isolated pockets over Jammu and Kashmir, Northwest Rajasthan and Northwest Madhya Pradesh. Fog Observed (0530 IST of today): Very dense fog in isolated pockets of Jammu-Kashmir, Punjab, Haryana-Chandigarh, U.P, west Rajasthan; moderate to dense fog in isolated pockets of Delhi, East Raj.; Shallow to moderate fog in isolated pockets of West M.P, Jharkhand, Odisha,Bihar. [pic.twitter.com/tqY6B73iw1]— India Meteorological Department (@Indiametdept) [December 29, 2023] Dense fog conditions are likely to persist in the above-mentioned regions, however, conditions may improve gradually from Dec 31, stated IMD. Live Tv

author: yahoo
title: Mitch Marsh in brutal family development after agonising near-miss in MCG Test
text:
Mitch Marsh in brutal family development after agonising near-miss in MCG Test The Aussie fell just short of a Test century on day three of the Boxing Day Test, continuing an unwanted family tradition. 28 December 2023 at 11:19 pm · 3-min read Mitch Marsh fell painfully short of a Boxing Day Test tonne, continuing the trend of Marsh's in falling just short at the MCG, with his brother Shaun falling on 99 some nine years ago, while his father Geoff made 86 in his final match at the MCG against India in 1991. Image: Getty/Mitch Marsh's Instagram
Mitch Marsh was left distraught after being dismissed for 96 after a sublime knock on day three of the Boxing Day Test , suffering the same MCG curse as his family before him. The West Australian was dismissed for the second time in the series in the 90s, after edging a Mir Hamza ball to slip.
The 32-year-old's entire family was present at the iconic cricket ground as he narrowly missed a well-deserved hundred. Having ridden his luck early after being dropped on just 20, Marsh was measured as he built a big score and was in dismay after being sent packing so close to a tonne.
'MODERN FIRST': David Warner slammed for Test act by ex-selector
'JOKE': Cricket world blows up on Marnus and Khawaja farce
"I guess there is a lot of history at this ground with the Boxing Day Test and a bloody big honours board I was close to getting on, but it wasn’t meant to be," Marsh said.
The disappointment comes nine years after older brother Shaun was run out for 99 in the second innings of the Boxing Day Test match against India at the MCG. His father Geoff, also made 86 at the iconic Melbourne stadium in a match against India in 1991, with the unwanted record of none of the Marsh's ever managing to crack the tonne at the MCG for Australia continuing.
“Shaun has technically still got me, so I guess there is a little bit of history there for us. But hopefully, I get one more crack at it,” Marsh said.
Mitch Marsh was left distraught after he fell to the same fate as his family before him, unable to make a milestone century at the MCG, falling for 96. Image: Getty (Icon Sportswire via Getty Images) Mitch Marsh rescues struggling Aussies Despite the disappointment of falling short of a century, Marsh's knock was instrumental for Australia, coming in four wickets down with a lead of just 70 runs. At the end of day three Marsh's sublime innings helped Australia to a 241-run lead, with four wickets in hand heading into day four.
“There are a lot of voices inside your head at four for 16,” Marsh said. “But I think it just comes back to being true to myself (and) being really clear on my role within this team and knowing that how I play my best.
Story continues “I guess getting on the counterattack and being positive in that situation … it can almost put more pressure on you when there’s a couple of guys building a partnership. It was just about getting myself in and then playing the way I have for the last like six months.”
Marsh backs Australia to defend any total at MCG The last team to score more than 300 in the fourth innings of an MCG Test was Pakistan in a losing cause back in 1990 and Marsh is confident Australia can defend any score, even the current 241-run lead if need be, saying anything extra from here is a bonus.
"I think if we were all out now we would feel very much in the game," Marsh said. "I don't necessarily want to put a number on it for our bowlers, but we know that they can certainly hold the bat. A couple of good partnerships with some tired bowlers now, hopefully, we can get up towards the 300 mark, but I guess anything from here we'll take."
- with AAP

author: Sol Mazzi
title: El Papa Francisco pidió que Ucrania “tenga el coraje” de izar la bandera blanca para negociar el fin de la guerra con Rusia | La 100
text: En una entrevista, el Papa Francisco manifestó que Ucrania debería tener la valentía de “izar la bandera blanca” y negociar con Rusia para [ponerle fin a la guerra](https://la100.cienradios.com/espectaculos/se-filtro-el-pacto-millonario-que-hizo-cinthia-fernandez-y-matias-defederico-para-ponerle-fin-a-la-guerra-cede-la-mitad/) que ya se cobró la vida de miles de personas. Preocupa la salud del papa Francisco: fue trasladado la hospital tras la audiencia general Francisco realizó estas declaraciones en una entrevista grabada el mes pasado con la emisora suiza RSI. Las afirmaciones se hicieron antes de la última propuesta del presidente turco, Tayyip Erdogan, basada en organizar una cumbre entre Rusia y Ucrania con el objetivo de terminar con el conflicto bélico. Erdogan presentó esta oferta luego de tener un encuentro en Estambul con el presidente ucraniano Volodímir Zelenski, quien manifestó que, si bien desea la paz, no cederá ningún territorio en las negociaciones. El plan de paz propuesto por el presidente ucraniano implica la retirada de las tropas rusas de Ucrania y el restablecimiento de sus fronteras estatales. Detalles sobre la entrevista del Papa Francisco tras pedir a Ucrania que “tenga el coraje” de negociar El entrevistador le preguntó al Papa sobre su posición en un debate entre aquellos que dicen que Ucrania debería rendirse debido a su incapacidad para resistir las [fuerzas rusas](https://la100.cienradios.com/mundo/ucrania-acuso-a-las-fuerzas-rusas-de-secuestrar-a-casi-2500-ninos-desde-el-comienzo-de-la-guerra/), y los que sostienen que hacerlo legitimaría las acciones de la parte más fuerte. Se utilizó el término “bandera blanca” en la pregunta. “Es una interpretación. Pero, creo que son más fuertes quienes ven la situación, quienes piensan en el pueblo, quienes tienen el coraje de izar la bandera blanca y negociar”, respondió. El Papa mencionó que la palabra “negociar” denota valentía y que cuando ves que estás derrotado es necesario tener el coraje de negociar. En otra parte de la entrevista, al hablar del conflicto entre Israel y Hamás, Francisco aseguró: “La negociación nunca es una rendición”. El presidente Zelenski declaró recientemente que 31.000 soldados ucranianos habían perdido la vida desde la invasión rusa de febrero de 2022, y que miles de civiles fueron asesinados en las zonas ocupadas del país.

author: hindi.sportskeeda.com
title: NBA: "Lebron & trade deadline, the most infamous duo" - NBA fans ridicule Lakers for eyeing Dorian Finney-Smith & Royce O'Neale at trade deadline
text:
') > -1) { addClass($('.section-container'), 'pill-tag'); } NBA fans react on social media over the reported interest of the LA Lakers in acquiring Brooklyn Nets veterans Royce O'Neal (L) and Dorian Finney-Smith (C) by the trade deadline. Like what you are reading? Unlock the Full Story for Free! Sign in with Google Continue with Facebook Login using other methods The LA Lakers are looking to shore up their roster by the NBA tradeline, reportedly eyeing veteran players Dorian Finney-Smith and Royce O’Neal from the Brooklyn Nets. And fans took the opportunity to joke about the team over it on social media.
The Lakers are currently ninth in the Western Conference with a 16-15 record heading into their scheduled game at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Thursday.
While they are still very much in the thick of things, some quarters believe the Lakers can use some upgrading in the wing position, hence the interest in Finney-Smith and O’Neal .
•

@LamesLarden wrote: Lebron and the trade deadline. The most infamous duo in the history of the NBA. Expand Tweet @HowUBenFeller wrote: The Lakers “could show interest” in every single player in the league Expand Tweet @TheSaurus831 wrote: The most tired story every year in the NBA is whoever the Lakers are interested in trading for to help LeBron make the playoffs Expand Tweet @2ezTrizzy wrote: Does this account get tired of posting: “The Lakers have shown interest in…” Expand Tweet @TechPalsTalk wrote: The lakers need Jesus lol Expand Tweet @CelticsBrr wrote: "basketball player breathes" Lakers may show interest in such a player Expand Tweet @BriggsSpeed wrote: Lakers going to show interest in the entire NBA Expand Tweet @JensenSantos7 wrote: Here we go again and yet another Lakers trade news with wanting new players. Next week, it’ll be different players; then the following week, another new players… Expand Tweet @HonestKDFan35 wrote: how much help does lebrun need?? Expand Tweet LeBron James expresses concern over Lakers’ ability to compete against top teams LA Lakers superstar LeBron James was forced to take stock of where they are in the ongoing NBA season following their 126-115 loss to rivals Boston Celtics on Christmas Day.
In particular, he expressed concern over their ability to compete against the top teams in the league, highlighting how, at this point, they remain far from the form they want to be.
James shared in the post-game interview following their loss to the Celtics (via the Bleacher Report):
"I don't think we're where we wanna be to be able to compete against the top teams." Expand Tweet The loss to the Celtics was the sixth in the last eight games for the Lakers (16-15), who have had to deal with players going in and out of the roster since the season started because of injuries.
